original_text:
The tongue of the nursing infant sticks
    to the roof of its mouth for thirst;
the children beg for food,
    but no one gives to them.
korean_text: 젖먹이가 목말라서 혀가 입천장에 붙음이여 어린 아이들이 떡을 구하나 떼어 줄 사람이 없도다

sentences.original_text: The tongue of the nursing infant sticks to the roof of its mouth for thirst
sentences.korean_translation: 젖먹이 아기의 혀가 목마름 때문에 입천장에 달라붙는다.

sentences.original_text: but no one gives to them
